overview: Vietnam, 1969. War is Hell.  For Marine Sergeant Jack Stryker, however, Hell is just the beginning.  Trapped outside a Viet Cong village, Stryker takes two bullets to the leg.  Sent home from the war, he discovers his ex-girlfriend has been kidnapped by a religious cult with a vicious Manson-like leader.  Stryker teams up with some marine friends to form an assassination squad and annihilate the gang of crazed killers.
title: Thou Shalt Not Kill... Except
